![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Iklan-PG-Dr-Hadi-980x543.jpeg)

### **Graduate Research Assistant position at the VLSI-Embedded Computing Architecture Design (VeCAD) Research Lab, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, Johor Bahru, Johor**

**About the position**  
Open to: Local Malaysian ONLY  
Program Name: Artificial Intelligence System-On-Chip  
Scope of Research: Develop innovative and efficient architectures for implementing advanced AI/ML algorithms on FPGA/ASIC platforms.  
Duration: 36 months  
Monthly Allowance: RM 2,300  
Fees Covered: RM 18,350 (6 semesters)

**Qualifications**  
A Masterâ€™s degree in Electrical, Electronics, or Computer Engineering.  
Proficiency in English.  
Experience with AI/ML, along with skills in C, Python, and/or RTL programming.

**How to Apply**  
Send your CV and background details to:  
Assoc. Prof. Ir. Dr. Ab Al-Hadi Ab Rahman  
Head of the VeCAD Research Lab  
Email: hadi@utm.my

**Application Deadline: 1st January 2025**  
**Start Date: 1st March 2025**
